---

# üìú notebooks & scripts

üìú [notebooks](./notebooks) and [scripts](./scripts) for ai experiments and aws batch jobs.

```bash
pip install notebooks-and-scripts
```

|   |   |
| --- | --- |
| üìú[`workflow`](https://github.com/kamangir/notebooks-and-scripts/tree/main/notebooks_and_scripts/workflow) [![image](https://kamangir-public.s3.ca-central-1.amazonaws.com/hourglass/workflow.gif?raw=true)](https://github.com/kamangir/notebooks-and-scripts/tree/main/notebooks_and_scripts/workflow) an abstraction to run mixed-type (cpu/gpu/...) [DAG](https://networkx.org/documentation/stable/reference/classes/digraph.html)s of commands on [aws batch](https://aws.amazon.com/batch/), and a few other compute resources. | üìú[`scripts`](https://github.com/kamangir/notebooks-and-scripts/tree/main/scripts) [![image](https://github.com/kamangir/assets/blob/main/nbs/3x4.jpg?raw=true)](https://github.com/kamangir/notebooks-and-scripts/tree/main/scripts) legacy mechanisms replaced with `@docker eval - <command>` and `@batch eval - <command>`. |
